channel.title: CoreUI PRO Changelog on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in CoreUI PRO Changelog on CoreUI

item.title: CoreUI PRO v5.0.0-rc.2
item.description: We’re excited to announce the release of version 5.0.0-rc.2, available as of February 29, 2024. This update marks a significant milestone, introducing a range of changes and improvements. A new Bootstrap theme enhances customization options and modernizes project aesthetics. The update to Bootstrap 5.3.3 brings new functionalities and fixes. We’ve also significantly bolstered support for Right-to-Left (RTL) text direction, aiding the development of applications for international markets. Dependency updates, including @babel/core, eslint, and sass, have been made to ensure better performance and security for applications. These changes reflect our commitment to providing developers with flexible, up-to-date tools that adhere to the latest standards and practices in software development.
